pages.text:
[Page Title: King Street Cabaret – Charleston South Carolina's Premier Gentleman's Club]

216 Transit Drive Greenville, SC 29607 Call us: (864) 676-9683 1337 King Street, Charleston, SC 29405 Call us:(843) 789-4488 
CHARLESTON'S ONLY TRUE GENTLEMAN'S CLUB

About Us
Beautiful, Exotic Fantasy & Fun…
Welcome to King Street Cabaret! 
We’re located directly off King Street in historic Charleston, SC. We throw HOT parties and have something for everyone. Five-star customer service and the most beautiful ladies in the world separate us from the competition. We host celebrities, from movie stars to athletes, with VIP services available. King Street Cabaret is great for sophisticated gentlemen or young executives who want to spoil themselves. We’re proud to be women-friendly and great for couples. Enjoy our nightly specials and events. Let us host your bachelor party or celebration of any kind. King Street Cabaret is an adult club for adults age 21 & over.

Club Tour

Specials

Happy Hour Monday-Friday 4pm-8pm

Half off House Liquors
$3 Domestic Beers
$2 Off Other Liquor, Beer and Wine

Monday

$3 Bud Light • $5 Fireball shots • $6 Grey Goose

Tuesday

$5 Well and Call Tequila • $3 Mich Ultra

Wednesday

$3 Domestic Beers • $6 Grey Goose

Thursday

$5 U Call It! (Crown, Call and House Liquors)

Friday

$5 Bombs • $5 Mules • $3 Shooters • $4 Coronas

Saturday

Ladies Free Admission! • $5 Long Island Tea • $5 Blue Motorcycle • $3 Bud Light

Sunday

SIN Night – Free admission with Proof of Employment in a Service Industry • $5 U call it (Crown and Down)

Contact Us

To contact us please give us a call or message us on social media!
Address 
King Street Cabaret
1337 King Street
Charleston, SC 29405

Phone:
(843)789-4488 Check Us Out 
Special guest dancers and fun filled themed parties are a constant at King Street Cabaret. Find us on social media to check out all of our upcoming events.
